KnowledgeItem.Title: SupervisorWorkflowHandlePKG
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for handling packages related to the installation of Supervisor by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding DataBlocks in the Issue.

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock SupervisorWorkflowHandlePKG and the necessary information for successful completion of workflow.

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks 
				PKG=supervisor
				TargetMachine=${SWHP:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created
				User=${SWHP:User}
				Lib=PKG
				Host=${SWHP:Host}
				CurrentState=ReadState
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}/> 
				</NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks 
				TargetMachine=${SWHP:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created
				User=${SWHP:User}
				Lib=FILECREATE
				FilePath='${SWHP:FilePath}'
				FileName=${SWHP:FileName}
				FileContent='[program:${SWHP:Program}] \ncommand=${SWHP:ProgramFile} \nautostart=true \nautorestart=true \nstderr_logfile=/var/log/long.err.log \nstdout_logfile=/var/log/long.out.log'
				Host=${SWHP:Host}
				CurrentState=ReadState
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}/> 
				</NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks 
				TargetMachine=${SWHP:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created
				User=${SWHP:User}
				Command='cd /etc/supervisor/conf.d && sudo supervisorctl reread'
				Lib=RUNCOMMAND
				Host=${SWHP:Host}
				CurrentState=ReadState
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}/> 
				</NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks 
				TargetMachine=${SWHP:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created
				User=${SWHP:User}
				Command='cd /etc/supervisor/conf.d && sudo supervisorctl update'
				Lib=RUNCOMMAND
				Host=${SWHP:Host}
				CurrentState=ReadState
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}/> 
				</NewBlock>
